DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Nicrophorus_carcassmicrobiome_analysis
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This contains files used in the analysis of the Nicrophorus vespilloides microbiome.It contains denoised, quality filtered reads for bacterial (Nvesp_16S_seqs.fna) and fungal (Nvesp_ITS_seqs.fna) datasets, metadata mapping files (16S_metadata.txt and ITS_metadata.txt), representative sequence sets for all OTUs (16S_rep_set.fna and ITS_repset.fasta) and the final OTU tables (16S_otutable.csv and ITS_otutable.csv).
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: carrion
microbiome
preservation
microbial succession
symbiosis
